body.content:
Good Day.

I represent an investor seeking`to invest through you,in any lucrative
investment in your country.If you have a solid background and
idea/capacity of making good profit in any  business.

We are writing to seek your highly esteemed help/ consent in a lasting
business relationship of mutual benefits for investing in your company
/country under a joint venture partnership. I'm willing to provide
investing capital with terms that cedes considerable swift equity
share to you as managerial dividends.

Kindly get back to me for more details.

Best Regards,
Mr Andrew Smith
